channel.title: Comments on: Book review: Don’t Make Me Think!
channel.description: Web development notes and commentary from Ryan Stille

item.title: By: Tawanna
item.dc:creator: Tawanna
item.description: Great review. I am very much interested in creating the most usable website as possible... some developers I have met could care less. This book seems really interesting. I too had heard of it before and wanted to read it, and now after reading this review I am definitely planning on going out to purchase it.
item.content:encoded: Great review. I am very much interested in creating the most usable website as possible… some developers I have met could care less. This book seems really interesting. I too had heard of it before and wanted to read it, and now after reading this review I am definitely planning on going out to purchase it.
